name: Named Editor Groups
description: Abstract away IDs by giving them a name!

auto-name-format.name: Auto Name Format
auto-name-format.description:
The format to use when auto naming groups (Build helper, Re-Group). Use {id} for the ID and {name} for the name.
<cr>Changes to this setting are NOT retroactive! That means changing this value while making a level will not re-apply the new format to the old IDs, which can and will break subsequent auto-named IDs!</c>

show-in-edit-level-layer.name: Named IDs Preview Button
show-in-edit-level-layer.description: Shows/hides the button to preview a read-only list of named IDs on the level edit screen

more-numeric-ids.name: More Numeric IDs
more-numeric-ids.description: Shows numeric IDs on triggers, that usually don't have them (<cf>End Trigger</c>, <cf>Event Trigger</c>, <cf>Area Triggers</c>...), as well as shows more info about existing triggers (<cl>Move Triggers</c>, <cl>Follow Triggers</c>, <cl>Instant Collision Triggers</c>...)

color-group.name: GroupID Color
color-group.description: Color used to highlight <cc>group</c> IDs in the editor

color-color.name: ColorID Color
color-color.description: Color used to highlight <cc>color</c> IDs in the editor

color-counter.name: CounterID Color
color-counter.description: Color used to highlight <cc>counter</c> (item) IDs in the editor

color-timer.name: TimerID Color
color-timer.description: Color used to highlight <cc>timer</c> IDs in the editor

color-collision.name: CollisionID Color
color-collision.description: Color used to highlight <cc>collision</c> IDs in the editor
